fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc

Class DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.upmc.components.cvm.pre.dcc.DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorI, DynamicallyConnectableComponentI, ComponentImplementedI, OfferedI, RequiredI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements DynamicallyConnectableComponentI
    The class DynamicallyConnectableComponentConnector connects a component requiring the dynamic component connection service from another component offering it.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 14 mars 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
